name: Forsaken Realm
description: In Forsaken Realm, the player takes on the role of a lord who has been banished by his feudal lord and is now trying to start a new realm with some loyal followers. Build the basic economy of your first settlement with care. Keep the balance of growth and supply of your underlings and grow from a small village to the new economic center of your realm. Open up resources, build new cities and build castles in tactically important locations. Configure your own troop types from a variety of pieces of equipment, such as plate armor, shields or spears, train your soldiers and defend your empire with them ... or expand it!
